title: Home at Last
description: In this conclusion to the Matanuska Series, Lukeâ€™s feelings of resentment, anger, and betrayal continue to fester after Jean and Ray's wedding. He decides he must leave Alaska. Knowing that he needs to change his life, he searches the Bible for guidance, realizing like Jonah, he has been running from God.Can Luke return home to make peace with all the things that drove him away?
author: Bonnie Leon
